item.title: 澳大利亚消费者信心从关税打击中部分恢复
item.description: 随着美国总统唐纳德-特朗普发动关税战的最初冲击略有减弱，衡量澳大利亚消费者情绪的一项指标在5月份出现部分反弹。【原文：A measure of Australian consumer sentiment partially rebounded in May as the initial shock of U.S. President Donald Trump's tariff war faded a little, an improvement that should be underpinned by the latest truce with China.】

item.title: 中美暂停关税战，油价从两周高点回落
item.description: 美国和中国同意暂时削减关税，引发了对世界两大经济体之间的贸易战即将结束的乐观情绪，油价周二从上一交易日触及的两周高点回落。【原文：Oil prices eased on Tuesday from a two-week high reached during the previous session after the U.S. and China agreed to temporarily slash tariffs, sparking optimism that a trade war between the world's two biggest economies would come to an end.】

item.title: 北斗星为香港数据中心扩建获得融资
item.description: 北斗数据中心（BDx Data Centers）周二表示，该公司已获得基础设施信贷公司 Clifford Capital、新加坡大华银行和日本三井住友银行的项目融资，用于在香港开发首个超大规模数据中心。【原文：BDx Data Centers said on Tuesday that it has secured project financing from infrastructure credit firm Clifford Capital, Singapore's United Overseas Bank and Japan's Sumitomo Mitsui Banking Corporation for the development of its first hyperscale data centre in Hong Kong.】

item.title: 美国众议院共和党人寻求取消电动汽车税收抵免和贷款计划
item.description: 美国众议院共和党人周一提议取消电动汽车税收抵免，并废除旨在促使汽车制造商生产更多零排放汽车的燃油效率规定，作为基础广泛的税制改革法案的一部分。【原文：Republicans in the U.S. House of Representatives on Monday proposed killing the electric vehicle tax credit and repealing fuel efficiency rules designed to prod automakers into building more zero-emission vehicles as part of a broad-based tax reform bill.】

item.title: 三星推出最薄智能手机，与竞争对手苹果展开竞争
item.description: 三星电子（Samsung Electronics）周二发布了迄今为止最薄的旗舰机型，该机型配备了增强型人工智能功能，以求在高端市场超越竞争对手苹果公司。【原文：Samsung Electronics made public on Tuesday its slimmest flagship model to date, complete with enhanced artificial intelligence features, as it seeks to get ahead of rival Apple on the premium market.】

item.title: 埃利奥特在菲利普斯 66 代理权争夺战中赢得 ISS 支持
item.description: 周一，埃利奥特投资管理公司（Elliott Investment Management）在与菲利普斯 66 公司（Phillips 66）的董事会斗争中取得了胜利，著名代理咨询公司机构股东服务公司（ISS）建议投资者选举该激进派提名的全部四名董事。【原文：Elliott Investment Management scored a victory on Monday in its board fight at Phillips 66 when prominent proxy advisory firm Institutional Shareholder Services (ISS) recommended that investors elect all four of the activist's director nominees.】

item.title: 巴西化妆品制造商 Natura 第一季度净亏损减少 84
item.description: 巴西化妆品制造商 Natura 周一公布，第一季度净亏损为 1.507 亿雷亚尔（约合 2660 万美元），比去年同期缩小 83.9%。【原文：Brazilian cosmetic maker Natura posted on Monday a first-quarter net loss of 150.7 million reais ($26.6 million), 83.9% narrower than a year earlier.】

item.title: 中国电商巨头在快速交付上押下昂贵赌注
item.description: 中国电子商务巨头阿里巴巴和京东在持续的市场份额争夺战中开辟了一条新战线，两家公司今年都在积极拓展以30至60分钟送达速度为核心的所谓即时零售业务。【原文：Chinese e-commerce giants Alibaba and JD.com have opened a new front in the ongoing battle for market share, with both expanding aggressively into so-called instant retail centred around delivery speeds of 30 to 60 minutes this year.】

item.title: 美国医疗保险计划制定第三轮药品价格谈判时间表
item.description: 美国医疗保险与医疗补助服务中心（CMS）周一表示，它将在明年 2 月初公布有资格参加第三轮医疗保险价格谈判的 15 种药品名单。【原文：The U.S. Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services (CMS) said on Monday that it would announce a list of 15 drugs eligible for a third round of Medicare price negotiations by early February next year.】

item.title: 据 The Information 报道，谷歌正在年度会议之前开发人工智能代理软件
item.description: 据 The Information 周一报道，Alphabet 旗下的谷歌公司在其年度开发者大会之前向员工和外部开发者展示了一系列不同的产品，其中包括用于软件开发的人工智能代理。【原文：Alphabet's Google has been demonstrating to employees and outside developers an array of different products, including an AI agent for software development, ahead of its annual developer conference, The Information reported on Monday.】

item.title: 乔恩-沃伊特、好莱坞联盟要求特朗普考虑税收优惠政策
item.description: 据路透社周一看到的一封信称，由美国电影业工会和公会组成的联盟在老牌演员乔恩-沃伊特（Jon Voight）的加入下，要求美国总统唐纳德-特朗普在推动国内电影制作的过程中考虑实施税收优惠政策。【原文：A coalition of American film industry unions and guilds, joined by veteran actor Jon Voight, has asked U.S. President Donald Trump to consider implementing tax incentives in his push to promote domestic film productions, according to a letter seen by Reuters on Monday.】

item.title: 交易日：关税休战改变市场 "游戏规则
item.description: 交易日【原文：TRADING DAY】

item.title: 特朗普的药品定价令打击了药房福利管理公司
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统周一在其关于药品定价的行政命令中打击了负责谈判美国药品价格的私营部门中间商，称他将把这些中间商排除在外，作为使美国与其他国家保持一致的目标的一部分。【原文：President Donald Trump on Monday delivered a blow to the private-sector middlemen who negotiate U.S. drug prices in his executive order on drug pricing, saying he would cut them out as part of a goal to bring the U.S. in line with other countries.】

item.title: 梅赛德斯将在阿拉巴马州工厂增产 GLC SUV
item.description: 梅赛德斯高管周一表示，公司将在阿拉巴马州塔斯卡卢萨的工厂为北美地区增产 GLC SUV。【原文：Mercedes executives on Monday said the company will add production of its GLC SUV for North America at its plant in Tuscaloosa, Alabama.】

item.title: 全球银行业监管机构同意优先开展气候风险工作
item.description: 全球银行业监管机构周一同意加强努力，更好地了解气候变化带来的金融风险，而美国对此表示反对。【原文：Global banking regulators on Monday agreed to intensify efforts to better understand the financial risks posed by climate change amid pushback from the United States.】

item.title: UPS 撤资后，亚马逊与联邦快递建立新合作关系
item.description: 亚马逊周一表示，它已于 2 月底与联邦快递（FedEx）建立了新的合作伙伴关系，以处理其部分包裹递送业务。【原文：Amazon said on Monday it has struck a new partnership with FedEx in late February to handle some parts of its package deliveries.】

item.title: 特朗普称减肥药为降价目标
item.description: 特朗普政府周一在降低处方药价格的工作中将包括韦格威和Zepbound在内的强效减肥新药列为目标。【原文：The Trump administration on Monday singled out powerful new weight-loss drugs including Wegovy and Zepbound as targets in its push to lower prescription drug prices.】

item.title: 美国将快速审批犹他州铀矿开采许可
item.description: 美国内政部周一表示，将快速审批安菲尔德能源公司在犹他州拟建的天鹅绒伍德铀矿项目的环境许可，以推动唐纳德-特朗普总统加强国内能源生产的努力。【原文：The U.S. Interior Department said on Monday it will fast-track environmental permitting for Anfield Energy's proposed Velvet-Wood uranium mine project in Utah to boost President Donald Trump's efforts to ramp up domestic energy production.】

item.title: 戛纳电影节总监希望了解特朗普关税计划的更多细节
item.description: 戛纳电影节总监蒂埃里-弗莱莫（Thierry Fremaux）周一表示，在讨论唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统提出的对美国境外制作的电影征收关税之前，他希望了解更多细节。【原文：Cannes Film Festival director Thierry Fremaux wants more details before discussing President Donald Trump's proposed tariffs on films made outside the United States, he said on Monday.】

item.title: 受关税影响，美国 4 月汽车价格上涨
item.description: 周一公布的数据显示，4月份美国新车价格飙升，这表明美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的汽车关税措施正在汽车市场产生影响。【原文：U.S. new-vehicle prices surged in April, data released on Monday showed, a sign that the effects of President Donald Trump's auto-tariff measures are rippling through the car market.】

item.title: 美国 4 月预算盈余增至 2,580 亿美元，年初至今赤字突破 1 万亿美元
item.description: 美国财政部周一表示，美国政府 4 月份的预算盈余为 2,580 亿美元，比去年同期增长 23%，约合 490 亿美元，这反映出税收季最后一个月的税收收入强劲，以及进口关税的大幅增长。【原文：The U.S. government posted a $258 billion budget surplus for April, up 23%, or about $49 billion, from a year earlier, reflecting strong tax receipts in the final month of the tax season and surging collections of import duties, the Treasury Department said on Monday.】

item.title: Equinor 称可能因特朗普命令而取消纽约海上风电项目
item.description: 美国一个大型海上风电项目的开发商警告说，如果不能在未来几天内就特朗普政府发布的停工令达成解决方案，它将取消纽约海岸的帝国风电设施。【原文：The developer of a major U.S. offshore wind project warned that it will cancel the Empire Wind facility off the coast of New York if it cannot reach a resolution over a stop-work order issued by the Trump administration in the coming days.】

item.title: 美联储调查发现第一季度贷款标准收紧，需求减弱
item.description: 美联储周一发布的一份报告显示，美国银行高级贷款官员表示，今年前三个月信贷标准有所收紧。【原文：Top U.S. bank lending officers said credit standards tightened over the first three months of the year, according to a report released on Monday by the Federal Reserve.】

item.title: 官方表示，比亚迪巴西工厂将于 2026 年底前 "全面投入使用
item.description: 巴伊亚州劳工部长奥古斯托-瓦斯孔塞洛斯（Augusto Vasconcelos）周一在一段视频中表示，中国电动汽车制造商比亚迪在巴西的新工厂将于2026年12月 "全面投入运营"，此前该工厂因劳工侵权调查而推迟运营。【原文：Chinese electric car maker BYD's new factory in Brazil will be "fully functional" by December 2026, after its operations were delayed because of an investigation into labor abuses, Bahia state labor secretary Augusto Vasconcelos said in a video on Monday.】

item.title: 美国 4 月预算盈余增长 23% 至 2,580 亿美元，海关收入激增
item.description: 美国财政部周一表示，美国政府 4 月份的预算盈余为 2,580 亿美元，比去年同期增长 23%，这反映了税收季最后一个月的税收收入强劲以及进口关税的激增。【原文：The U.S. government posted a $258 billion budget surplus for April, up 23% from a year earlier, reflecting strong tax receipts in the final month of the tax season and surging collections of import duties, the Treasury Department said on Monday.】

item.title: 欧盟分析美英贸易协定对欧盟和全球贸易的影响
item.description: 欧洲经济专员瓦尔蒂斯-东布罗夫斯基斯（Valdis Dombrovskis）周一表示，欧盟委员会正在分析美国和英国上周达成的贸易协议对欧盟27国和全球贸易的影响。【原文：The European Commission is analysing the trade deal struck last week between the United States and Britain for implications for the 27-nation European Union and global trade, European Economic Commissioner Valdis Dombrovskis said on Monday.】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会主席称该机构计划为加密代币制定新规则
item.description: 美国证券交易委员会（Securities and Exchange Commission）主席保罗-阿特金斯（Paul Atkins）周一提出了全面改革该机构加密货币政策的愿景，称他计划为属于证券的加密代币发行制定指导方针，并考虑是否有必要增加豁免。【原文：Paul Atkins, the chair of the Securities and Exchange Commission, laid out his vision for overhauling the agency's cryptocurrency policies on Monday, saying he plans to establish guidelines for distributions of crypto tokens that are securities and consider whether additional exemptions are necessary.】

item.title: 解说员：特朗普对削减药价说了什么？
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）周一签署了一项范围广泛的行政命令，指示制药商降低处方药的价格，使之与其他国家的价格保持一致。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump signed a broad executive order on Monday directing drugmakers to lower the prices of their prescription drugs to align with what other countries pay.】

item.title: Graco 婴儿车制造商 Newell 在恢复对华发货前寻求关税细节
item.description: 纽威品牌公司（Newell Brands）的一位发言人周一表示，在可能恢复从中国发货的 Graco 婴儿推车和儿童汽车座椅之前，纽威品牌公司正在寻求美国新降低的关税将如何实施的更明确信息。【原文：Newell Brands is looking for more clarity on how newly lowered U.S. tariffs will be applied before potentially resuming shipments of its Graco baby strollers and child car seats from China, a spokesperson said on Monday.】

item.title: 欧盟监管机构询问 Starlink 是否是 SES 和 Intelsat 的可靠竞争对手
item.description: 欧盟反垄断监管机构正在审查欧洲卫星公司 SES 出价 31 亿美元收购 Intelsat 的交易，并询问这两家公司的客户，埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的 Space X 旗下 Starlink 公司是否是他们可信的竞争对手。【原文：EU antitrust regulators, who are examining European satellite company SES's $3.1-billion bid for Intelsat, have asked the two companies' customers whether Elon Musk's Space X-owned Starlink is a credible rival to them.】
